description: This project explores scalable techniques for detecting similar or duplicate datasets in large-scale data lakes using Big Data frameworks like Apache Spark. It reimplements the DS-Prox early pruning algorithm and evaluates two machine learning modelsRandom Forest and Multilayer Perceptron (MLP).
A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries and software (by language). I

A curated collection of internship projects in machine learning, data analytics, and prompt engineering. Includes ANN implementation, EDA, SQL insights, and productivity frameworks with code, reports, and visualizations. Showcasing practical, real-world skills.
A unified semantic framework leveraging graph-based machine learning for IoT-healthcare data interoperability using RDF and R2RML.
A C++-based framework for privacy-preserving machine learning using HE and TEE
Code for case studies in paper "X-ANFIS: An Extensible and Cross-Learning ANFIS Framework for Machine Learning Tasks"

IntersectMatch is a hybrid AI framework that combines semantic similarity and supervised machine learning to evaluate resume-job fit. Built for the Advanced AI (MLR555) course, the model selects candidates based on the intersection of both methods.
A personal research repo exploring operating system development, machine learning workflows, and cross-platform GUI applications using C/C++, Assembly, Python, and modern frameworks.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

A comprehensive machine learning framework that automates model selection and hyperparameter optimization using genetic algorithms and exhaustive search methods. Features an interactive Streamlit dashboard for visualizing model performance, comparing algorithms, and exporting results to Excel.

This project is a machine learning-based web app built with Python and the Streamlit framework to detect whether a news article is real or fake. It uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to process text data and classify it using a Logistic Regression model.

Smart contracts are pivotal in blockchain applications but are prone to vulnerabilities that can lead to significant losses. SmartGuard: Multi-Stage Smart Contract Vulnerability Detection tackles this issue by developing a machine learning framework to identify eight vulnerability types using datasets from Kaggle and Hugging Face.
A PyTorch based training framework for a Machine Learning Driving Simulator
This is the source code of my open-source web-based tool, equipped with machine learning using the TensorFlow.js framework. Its functionality allows face detection through live camera recordings.
This is the official repository for CardioLab. A machine and deep learning framework for the estimation and monitoring of laboratory abnormalities throught ECG data.

A stock return prediction framework based on ensemble learning that combines multi-source market data, including price changes, financial reports, institutional transactions, futures data, and news sentiment analysis. The model uses multiple NLP tools and uses stacked integration of machine learning models.
Machine Learning framework allowing plug-and-play training for pytorch models

In this project, we aim to develop a causal machine learning framework for optimizing digital ad campaigns by accurately measuring the true causal impact of ads on user engagement (e.g., click-through rate, conversions) using Causal ML Techniques.

This project focuses on classifying different types of rice using machine learning techniques. It leverages Optuna, a powerful hyperparameter optimization framework, to fine-tune the model for better accuracy and performance. The workflow typically involves:
[WIP] Machine Learning Molecular ForceField Training and Deploying Framework
A Democratized, lightweight and modern framework for Python Automated Machine Learning
A simple CRUD for tracking machine learning aggregates and storing their data. Created to be used alongside pybondi frameworks.
:exclamation:Thisisaread-onlymirroroftheCRANRpackagerepository.  BioM2BiologicallyExplainableMachineLearningFramework
A framework for cryptic pocket prediction using MSMD and machine learning

A Flask-based machine learning web API for real-time tweet sentiment analysis. This project uses the Sentiment140 dataset to train a logistic regression model that classifies tweets as positive or negative. The API accepts JSON input and returns sentiment predictions, tested using Postman.

This repository contains a collection of machine learning models deployed using Streamlit, a Python-based framework for building interactive web applications. The project demonstrates how to effectively integrate machine learning workflows with a user-friendly interface,making it easier for end users to interact with and understand machine learning
A framework for fast machine learning prototype
ustom torch style machine learning framework with automatic differentiation implemented on numpy, allows build GANs, VAEs, etc.
LLM implementations with AIX machine learning framework.
An opinionated machine learning framework.

This guide outlines a structured framework for presenting AI and machine learning projects effectively. It includes a step-by-step breakdown of slide content, starting from the project title and introduction to dataset exploration, methodology, model implementation, evaluation, deployment, and final insights.

Framework for spatial selectivity estimation using machine learning and optimizer feedback. Addresses both RCC filters and distance-based filters by transforming estimation into regression task. Compares neural networks, tree-based models and instance-based approaches against traditional RTree and histogram methods across 14 spatial datasets.

A production-ready, full-stack application for AI-Powered Red Team Security operations. This platform simulates adversarial offensive operations using machine learning, cybersecurity tools, and ethical hacking frameworks.
Framework for training machine learning models from streamed data
A unified framework for privacy-preserving data analysis and machine learning
A Novel Framework for Soybean Phenotype Prediction and Salient Loci Mining via Machine Learning and Interpretability Analysis

A modular framework for generating structural node embeddings using the Weisfeiler-Lehman (1-WL) algorithm. This project explores label propagation and encoding strategies (one-hot, label ID, dense) for enhancing graph-based machine learning tasks. Ideal for research in graph representation learning and GNN preprocessing.

A beginner-friendly implementation of Linear Regression from scratch using only core Python libraries. This project demonstrates the fundamentals of building a machine learning model without relying on external ML frameworks like Scikit-learn or TensorFlow. Includes data preprocessing, gradient descent, model evaluation, and visualizations.
Materials Learning Algorithms. A framework for machine learning materials properties from first-principles data.
Files related to A Machine Learning based Comprehensive Framework for Real-Time Drowsiness Detection via Single-Channel Electroencephalogram Signal Analysis

AutoQML is a Python-based AutoML framework that integrates classical machine learning algorithms with quantum machine learning techniques, enabling automated and efficient model development for both worlds.
A Rust machine learning framework.
A generalised framework for property-driven machine learning, combining input region specification via hyper-rectangles with differentiable logics to compile logical constraints into loss.
Fepfm: A post-disturbance frequency extremes prediction framework for power systems based on machine learning
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone
MACHINE LEARNING
ABioFinder: Antibiotic Biomarker Finder is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.
An Efficient Distributed Machine Learning Inference Framework with Byzantine Fault Detection

An IPL score prediction web app built using machine learning and Flask. The model predicts match scores based on historical IPL data. The Flask framework provides the backend for serving the model and handling user input via an intuitive web interface
A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits

Customer segmentation divides customers into groups based on behavior, demographics, or purchase patterns for targeted marketing. Frameworks like RFM analysis, K-means clustering, and decision trees are used. Python, with libraries like Pandas, Scikit-learn, and TensorFlow, enables effective machine learning-based segmentation.
Nerlnet is a framework for research and development of distributed machine learning models on IoT
A computer vision and machine learning pipeline on a distributed framework. Designed for an embedded network on low voltage IoT hardware.
This repository provides tools to integrate Autogluon, an automated machine learning framework, into the Galaxy workflow environment
SCalable Continual Learning - An experimental machine learning framework for the investigation of continual learning algorithms.
A machine learning framework with readable source code
A machine learning-based geospatial framework for urban heat vulnerability mapping in India using high-resolution spatial, climate, and socio-economic data.
A dump to all things LLMs, CUDA, DL frameworks, Tokenization Methods, and latest stuff Im building/researching with

PyTorch is a fully featured framework for building deep learning models, which is a type of machine learning that's commonly used in applications like image recognition and language processing. Written in Python, it's relatively easy for most machine learning developers to learn and use.
Foundations of Machine Learning Frameworks - week 1

A framework for analyzing P2P lending using network centrality metrics and MST-based network analysis, combined with machine learning models (XGBoost, Random Forest, Logistic Regression) to predict loan success and manage risk. Validated on real datasets for improved accuracy and scalability.

Python framework for comprehensive variant detection in whole genome sequences using advanced machine learning models for cross domain pattern recognition in fitness, pharmacogenetics and nutritional aspects of sprint running
A single header Torch like C++ machine learning framework with multiple device acceleration support.

MoleculeBind is a machine-learning framework for chemistry, where we target unifying various molecular representations into one common latent space (SELFIES, SMILES, Graph, Structures, Fingerprints, Molecular Spectra)
An orchestration framework for End-to-End Machine Learning Serving with Resource Optimization on Heterogeneous Edge
A Master's thesis project on distinguishing stellar remnant binaries in LISA data using statistical and machine learning frameworks

This repository implements the Double Machine Learning framework for estimating causal effects in high-dimensional or complex settings, combining the strength of machine learning with causal inference.
In this project I build an end to end framework to predict fraudulent transactions by applying various machine learning models with a special focus on sampling techniques and standardization.

A collection of neural networks implemented from scratch in Python using NumPy, including a fully connected feedforward network and an upcoming convolutional neural network (CNN). No machine learning frameworks used.
A lightweight machine learning framework built from scratch in Python.
A framework that uses Item Response Theory to evaluate fairness in machine learning models.
Cloud-Aware DEM Inundation Mapping (CADIM) : A geospatial framework for flood mapping under cloud cover using machine learning and digital elevation models (DEMs).
Foundation of machine learning framework week 1-

This repository documents my daily learning journey in Machine Learning. I upload ML code, experiments, and projects regularly to enhance my understanding of concepts like data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment. Follow along as I explore algorithms, frameworks, and real-world applications in ML!
The aim of this project is to develop a machine learning framework that will learn from safe traffic environments and use that data to propose improvements in high risk traffic areas.

This project utilizes a machine learning model to predict temperature based on various weather features. It has been implemented using Django and Django REST Framework to create an API that allows POST requests to obtain predictions.
Stochastic Resonance and Machine Learning Based Noise Reduction Framework
A demo project for TensorFlow. TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) framework developed by Google.
Open-Source package for segmentation and analysis of gel electrophoresis images using machine learning.  Both a python framework for training/running models and a QuPath GUI extension are available.
A general _purpose framework for solving problrm with machine learing applied to predicting customer churn
Global-Scale Chlorophyll-a Monitoring for Inland Lake Water Quality Framework: Advancements, Machine Learning Models, and Transferability Challenges
A flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials.

Reinforce4j is a Java library designed for implementing reinforcement learning algorithms, with a primary focus on Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS). It provides tools and frameworks for building agents that can learn to play games, demonstrated with examples like Tic-Tac-Toe and Connect 4. The library supports integration with machine learning models
A machine learning application demonstrating neural networks implementation in Rust using the Burn framework. This project showcases an Iris flower classifier with a simple multilayer perceptron.

ArcSight Defence is a powerful Android application powered by Machine Learning, designed for analytical purposes to study information about guns, equipment, and grenades used by Indian Paramilitary forces. It utilizes advanced Machine Learning frameworks to provide users with insightful and detailed knowledge without requiring complex research.
Proactive Detection of APTs in IIoT Using a Real-Time Machine Learning Framework

A machine learning-based framework for sustainable and precision groundwater pollution management at industrial brownfields, integrating dimensionality reduction, clustering, and deep multi-view fusion of multi-source data.

ScaleExplorer is a simulation framework that enables agile exploration over the large machine learning model design and optimization space. This new capability will unlock efficiency and sustainability optimization opportunities to flexibly adapt to the constantly-changing training environment.
Modular and explainable stacked machine learning framework for environmental and structured data analysis. Includes preprocessing, evaluation, SHAP explainability, and tutorial notebooks.

The Object Detection System is a deep learning-based project developed using MXNet, an open-source deep learning framework. The project aims to detect and classify objects in images or video streams using advanced machine learning models.
Equitrain: A Unified Framework for Training and Fine-tuning Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
Anacostia is a framework for creating machine learning operations (MLOps) pipelines
The official code repository for "Optimal Spectroscopic Measurement Design: Bayesian Framework for Rational Data Acquisition," Machine Learning: Science and Technology 6, 025037 (2025).
A topological machine learning framework based on PyTorch
Systematic Trust in AI Models: Ensuring Fairness, Reliability, Explainability and Accountability in Machine Learning Frameworks
An open-source machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions.

A Python-based machine learning project for comparing multiple models on classification and regression tasks. Includes data preprocessing, feature selection, model evaluation, and visualization components. Analyzes Decision Trees, Random Forests, KNN, SVM, Neural Networks and more to identify the best-performing model for your dataset.
A Machine Learning Framework for Comprehensive Classification of Plant Transcription Factors

This repo showcases a collection of innovative Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) projects, demonstrating expertise in cutting-edge technologies and algorithms. Explore this repo to find practical implementations and solutions for various AI-driven tasks.

Deepfake Detection is a machine learning project that identifies whether a video is real or fake. The model is trained on real video data to learn natural facial patterns and detects deepfakes by spotting inconsistencies in facial features or movements. Built using Python and deep learning frameworks.
